article:
{{Infobox university |name =Texas A&M University |image_name = Texas A&M
University Seal.png |image_size =183px |tagline =A Unique American Institution
|established =1876 Note that the seal
contains the date 1876, the year in which Texas A&M began classes. This is not a
discrepancy as both 1871 (the year the Texas Legislature appropriated funds to
begin A&M's construction) and 1876 can be considered the dates of establishment
depending on the definition used and the reference sourced (even within the
Texas A&M University system). |type =Flagship university

(spring 2011)
